__e: - Did Helen tell you all this?
If Helen finds you, we'll both be in a lot of trouble.
- And yet, there's something about what Helen said that stayed with you, that... that makes you think she might be on to something.
Helen, you have no idea what you're talking about!
Plus, it might be good for me and Helen not to be together all the time.
I appreciate it, but I've already told Helen yes, and... I plan on keeping my word on that.
She's not a go-getter. She's so picky.
I want to know what the hell you're doing sending this guy to my home, in front of Helen and the kids.
What if Helen's right, and this guy sits down and turns out something good?
So you want to know if Helen found anything?
Helen just lost her husband, so don't play any Duke Ellington in the house.
She's odd, Helen, but who wouldn't be.
The first night Helen leaves, I'm bringing dames in here.
Sure, but what Helen has is way worse than that.
You know, since I met Helen, I feel more confident in myself, you know. I know what I want to be.
Helen told me that they named a whole type of school of painting after that place.
The worst day was the time... my doctor told my mom and dad what Aunt Helen did to me.
